name: Ballmancer (Original Jam Version)
description:
Originally made in September 2018 for the UAT Founder’s Jam 2018

Ballmancer is a level based game in which you use ball magic to kill enemies and find the orbs of power!

Programming - @smol_jordan
Design - @kevinalbregard
Art - @kevinalbregard, @thecreepyreaper
